summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2740, for the improvement of Railroad Avenue, from the southerly line of Pike Street to the northerly line of Bay Street, all in the City of Seattle, by reconstructing all portions of the existing trestle where necessary; by planking and replanking the same, and by paving the same with suitable material, under Ordinance No. 32539 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
